body:
Comment 18 by **bill.derose11**: 
Here (http://play.golang.org/p/yBteTMk2oS) when we pass in the string to be printed it
only prints the first value in the array. When we don't pass in anything to the closure
(http://play.golang.org/p/Yld6qIrFQN), the last value in the array is printed.
I hashed these out quickly before class so there may be a glaring error in my
implementation.
